CustomField.description:
Payment Terms for an open item.
This is used to calculate the due date for the open item.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Either PYMNT_TERMS_CD or DUE_DT must be provided.
PYMNT_TERMS_CD must be populated if DUE_DT is left blank (the due date will be calculated through ASOF_DT and the Payment Term.).
CustomField.label: Pymnt_Terms_Cd
